com.smarthome.emulator.simulations.basis

Class Value

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.smarthome.emulator.simulations.basis.Value

  • public class Value
extends java.lang.Object
    Stores information about Sensor's value. Generates new value for Float type values with normal distribution.

    • Method Detail

      • nextValue

        public void nextValue()
        Stores current value and generates new value (currently only for Float values) with normal distribution function

      • normalDistribution

        public static float normalDistribution(Value value,
                       int accuracy)
        Generates new value from current one with accuracy given as parameters. Accuracy = 10 for 1 decimal, 100 for to decimals, ...
        Parameters:
        value - current value
        accuracy - 10 for 1 decimal, 100 for to decimals, ...
        Returns:
        newly generated value

      • storeValue
